ComicInfo.Summary:
In the Shimmerspace Pitt encounters an older Timmy who tells him in the future he will be faced the choice of killing his son or killing Timmy. Pitt leaves the Shimmerpace and returns to our world to find that much time has passed and Timmy is now a troubled teen.
